ygData.subject: Re: faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 9 Date: Mon, 21 Jun 1999 09:07:03 +0200 From: Vincent Archer  Subject: Re: faction ... I went exploring with a fellow ally over
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 9
Date: Mon, 21 Jun 1999 09:07:03 +0200
From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
Subject: Re: faction

According to Tom Bratina:
>update... i just read a post on stratics that says u can lose faction on
>all
>of the servers by killing other PC's (ie. duels).

I went exploring with a fellow ally over in Lake Rathe today and stumbled
across the Arena across the way. Since we were there, we thought "what the
heck" and decided to duel. We were both virgin duelers and thought it would
be interesting, him being a level 20 Bard. I'm the same level.

Hehehe. I just laugh when I think about it now. He couldn't touch me.
Shadow step....zap....shadow step....zap. :) He was down with 3 hits of
force shock. :) (flashes of my old Quake fests come to mind) We both had
fun anyway...he vowed to get me back another day. I'll have to keep looking
behind my back. *snicker* Now I know why some of you chose the PVP server.

This just came to mind on this thread because I remember my elf faction went
down a notch. Sure hope I'm not KOS when I get home. ;)

Proud of our class,
-- Lim'Dul
20lvl High-elf Wiz Veeshan
